channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Micron Needs a New Memory Boost
item.description: Worries about PC and smartphone demand have pushed down the memory-chip maker’s stock, offsetting an AI lift.

item.title: RxSight stock positioned for long-term growth says BTIG analyst
Here's What Happens to Markets When Interest Rates Fall, in Charts
item.description: History shows some of the prospects for stocks, bonds and other investments after the Fed begins to cut rates.

item.title: KKR raises $4.6 billion for debut North America mid-market deals fund
America's Ambitious Climate Plan Is Faltering
item.description: Global emissions are at records, and the shift away from fossil fuels is slowing amid high costs and surging power demand.

item.title: Fed rate cuts will put money in pockets, but a mood shift may take time
South Korea Can Go Only So Far Copying Japan's Market Reforms
item.description: Returns might improve, but the power of chaebols—including Samsung and Hyundai—will limit the gains.

item.title: Trump attempted assassination suspect Ryan Routh to appear in court
The Rate Cut Happened. Not All Borrowing Costs Are Going Down.
item.description: The yield on 10-year Treasury notes is a reminder that the Fed doesn’t have complete control over borrowing costs.

item.title: White House touts $1 billion fund to help auto suppliers retool for EVs
